item.title: Numerous methods to ignite internal innovation at TRA
item.description:
Source: TRA. The Telecommunications Regulatory Authority (TRA) has implemented new programs to encourage internal innovation. Employees now have expanded opportunities to share their insights and actively participate in the TRA’s development. The Idea for Tomorrow initiative, implemented at both TRA’s Abu Dhabi and Dubai locations, features idea boards on each floor. This allows employees a convenient method for sharing suggestions. TRA’s Innovation Committee will then select ideas with the most potential to improve TRA’s services, work environment, and the telecommunications sector as a whole...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/numerous-methods-to-ignite-internal-innovation-at-tra/

item.title: The guidelines for using YouTube have been published by the UAE's Telecommunications Regulatory Authority (TRA)
item.description:
The Telecommunications Regulatory Authority (TRA) of the UAE has introduced guidelines for using YouTube as part of its UAE Social Media White Papers series. The TRA highlights the immense popularity of YouTube, with over a billion unique monthly users and over 100 hours of video uploaded every minute. They emphasize that UAE law forbids publishing content that violates public morals, Islamic principles, and the social and moral well-being of the UAE...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-guidelines-for-using-youtube-have-been-published-by-the-uae-s-telecommunications-regulatory-authority-tra/
